item.description:
Learn about the 9 Enneagram types in depth, what core type you are, personal growth for each type and how to relate to all 9 types. Herb acts out the 9 types with hats and songs. Lots of fun and insight about yourself and those important to you!


7:30-10pm

 

Herb Pearce is one of the leading experts on the Enneagram, having taught it for over 20 years to thousands of people. He is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and he uses it as his major focus in his individual, couples, family counseling and relationship coaching. He works in person and by phone. His latest book is available at www.herbstipsforliving.com.

www.herbpearce.com

781 648 3737

herb@herbpearce.com


$40, sliding scale to $20
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.why: Because you'll learn so much about personality types and how to communicate well to each type and you've been thinking about going to the Enneagram for a while. If you know the Enneagram, come to a refresher.
item.name: Enneagram Workshop
